it means dont call me dont im me dont try and make plans with me dont try in any way shape or form try to get into contact with me. for any reason. i dont care. i dont wanna know. i dont wanna hear from you until im ready. so stop trying or im really going to hate you and i will never tlak to you

Bernice

james dont be offended this isnt directed to just you


xoxo
Bernice
